item.title: Cracking an OSCP-like buffer overflow
item.description: So my OSCP PWK lab starts next saturday. Throughout the last few months, I’ve been slowly preparing myself to start the lab. Solved dozens of CTF VMs on vulnhub and tryhackme. One VM that particularly caught my attention is hosted on TryHackMe, a brilliant platform for security enthusiasts and professionals to practice their skills. This VM is Buffer Overflow Prep, which, according to friends who have taken the exam, it’s pretty close to the OSCP exam BoF machine.
